mapper.select: select id,name,(select name from xtgl_resource_cs where id=t.parent and state!='no') parent from xtgl_resource_cs t where parent in ('01010201','01010203','01010301','01010402') and id !='0101030110' and id !='0101030109' order by id

select count(*) id,'0101020101' name,'01010201' parent,'项目基础库' bz from xmk_wqgz where shzt='未审核'
and sbthcd=7 and sbthcd>=length(#{sourceid})
and tbbmbm like #{sourceid}||'%' and xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqh},0)||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101020102' name,'01010201' parent,'项目基础库' bz from xmk_abgc where shzt='未审核'
and sbthcd=7 and sbthcd>=length(#{sourceid})
and tbbmbm like #{sourceid}||'%' and xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqh},0)||'%'
union all select count(*) id,'0101020103' name,'01010201' parent,'项目基础库' bz from xmk_zhfz where shzt='未审核'
and sbthcd=7 and sbthcd>=length(#{sourceid})
and tbbmbm like #{sourceid}||'%' and xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqh},0)||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101020301' name,'01010203' parent,'项目审查库' bz from (select * from sck_wqgz t join xmk_wqgz on xmkid=xmk_wqgz.id) t where sck_shzt='未审核'
and sck_sbthcd=7 and sck_sbthcd>=length(#{sourceid})
and scbmbm like #{sourceid}||'%' and xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqh},0)||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101020302' name,'01010203' parent,'项目审查库' bz from (select * from sck_abgc t join xmk_abgc on xmkid=xmk_abgc.id) t where sck_shzt='未审核'
and sck_sbthcd=7 and sck_sbthcd>=length(#{sourceid})
and scbmbm like #{sourceid}||'%' and xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqh},0)||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101020303' name,'01010203' parent,'项目审查库' bz from (select * from sck_zhfz t join xmk_zhfz on xmkid=xmk_zhfz.id) t where sck_shzt='未审核'
and sck_sbthcd=7 and sck_sbthcd>=length(#{sourceid})
and scbmbm like #{sourceid}||'%' and xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqh},0)||'%'
union all select count(*) id,'0101030101' name,'01010301' parent ,'项目计划库' bz from plan_wqgz jh left join sck_wqgz sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_wqgz lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where jh_sbthcd=4 and jh.sbzt='1' and jh.spzt='0'
union all select count(*) id,'0101030102' name,'01010301' parent ,'项目计划库' bz from plan_abgc jh left join sck_abgc sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_abgc lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where jh_sbthcd=4 and jh.sbzt='1' and jh.spzt='0'
union all select count(*) id,'0101030103' name,'01010301' parent ,'项目计划库' bz from plan_zhfz jh left join sck_zhfz sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_zhfz lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where jh_sbthcd=4 and jh.sbzt='1' and jh.spzt='0'
union all select count(*) id,'0101030104' name,'01010301' parent ,'项目计划库' bz from plan_gcsj jh left join plan_lx_gcsj lx on (jh.id=lx.jhid) where jh_sbthcd=4 and jh.sbzt='1' and jh.spzt='0'
union all select count(id) id, '0101030105' name,'01010301' parent ,'项目计划库' bz from (select distinct jh.id from plan_gcgj jh left join plan_lx_gcgj lx on (jh.id=lx.jhid) where jh_sbthcd=4 and jh.sbzt='1' and jh.spzt='0' ) union all select count(*) id,'0101030106' name,'01010301' parent ,'项目计划库' bz from plan_yhdzx jh left join plan_lx_yhdzx lx on(jh.id=lx.jhid) where jh_sbthcd=4 and sbzt='1' and spzt='0'
union all select count(*) id,'0101030107' name,'01010301' parent ,'项目计划库' bz from plan_shuih jh left join plan_lx_shuih lx on (jh.id=lx.jhid) where jh_sbthcd=4 and sbzt='1' and spzt='0'
union all select count(*) id,'0101030108' name,'01010301' parent,'项目计划库' bz from plan_hsly where xzqhdm like #{xzqh} union all select count(*) id,'0101040201' name,'01010402' parent ,'月报进度' bz from plan_wqgz jh left join sck_wqgz sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_wqgz lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where sjsh='未审核' and spzt='1' and kgzt='1' and jgzt='0' and gydwbm like #{sourceid}||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101040202' name,'01010402' parent ,'月报进度' bz from plan_abgc jh left join sck_abgc sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_abgc lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where sjsh='未审核' and spzt='1' and kgzt='1' and jgzt='0' and gydwbm like #{sourceid}||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101040203' name,'01010402' parent ,'月报进度' bz from plan_zhfz jh left join sck_zhfz sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_zhfz lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where sjsh='未审核' and spzt='1' and kgzt='1' and jgzt='0' and gydwbm like #{sourceid}||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101040204' name,'01010402' parent ,'月报进度' bz from plan_yhdzx jh left join plan_lx_yhdzx lx on(jh.id=lx.jhid) where sjsh='未审核' and spzt='1' and kgzt='1' and jgzt='0' and gydwdm like #{sourceid}||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101040205' name,'01010402' parent ,'月报进度' bz from plan_shuih jh left join plan_lx_shuih lx on (jh.id=lx.jhid) where sjsh='未审核' and spzt='1' and kgzt='1' and jgzt='0' and gydwdm like #{sourceid}||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101040206' name,'01010402' parent ,'月报进度' bz from (select distinct(jh.id) from plan_gcgj jh left join plan_lx_gcgj lx on (jh.id=lx.jhid) where sjsh='未审核' and spzt='1' and kgzt='1' and jgzt='0' and gydwdm like #{sourceid}||'%' ) union all select count(*) id,'0101040207' name,'01010402' parent ,'月报进度' bz from plan_gcsj jh left join plan_lx_gcsj lx on (jh.id=lx.jhid) where sjsh='未审核' and spzt='1' and kgzt='1' and jgzt='0' and gydwdm like #{sourceid}||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101040208' name,'01010402' parent,'月报进度' bz from plan_hsly where xzqhdm like #{xzqh} and sjsh='未审核' and kgzt='1' and jgzt='0'

select count(*) id,'0101020101' name,'01010201' parent,'项目基础库' bz from xmk_wqgz where decode(sbthcd,length(#{sourceid}),'未上报',sbzt) ='未上报'
and sbthcd<=length(#{sourceid})
and tbbmbm like #{sourceid}||'%' and xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqh},0)||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101020102' name,'01010201' parent,'项目基础库' bz from xmk_abgc where decode(sbthcd,length(#{sourceid}),'未上报',sbzt) ='未上报'
and sbthcd<=length(#{sourceid})
and tbbmbm like #{sourceid}||'%' and xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqh},0)||'%'

and sbthcd<=length(#{sourceid})
and tbbmbm like #{sourceid}||'%' and xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqh},0)||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101020301' name,'01010203' parent,'项目审查库' bz from (select * from sck_wqgz t join xmk_wqgz on xmkid=xmk_wqgz.id) t where decode(sck_sbthcd,length(#{sourceid}),'未上报',sck_sbzt) ='未上报'
and sck_sbthcd<=length(#{sourceid})
and scbmbm like #{sourceid}||'%' and xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqh},0)||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101020302' name,'01010203' parent,'项目审查库' bz from (select * from sck_abgc t join xmk_abgc on xmkid=xmk_abgc.id) t where decode(sck_sbthcd,length(#{sourceid}),'未上报',sck_sbzt) ='未上报'
and sck_sbthcd<=length(#{sourceid})
and scbmbm like #{sourceid}||'%' and xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqh},0)||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101020303' name,'01010203' parent,'项目审查库' bz from (select * from sck_zhfz t join xmk_zhfz on xmkid=xmk_zhfz.id) t where decode(sck_sbthcd,length(#{sourceid}),'未上报',sck_sbzt) ='未上报'
and sck_sbthcd<=length(#{sourceid})
and scbmbm like #{sourceid}||'%' and xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqh},0)||'%'
union all select count(*) id,'0101030101' name,'01010301' parent ,'项目计划库' bz from plan_wqgz jh left join sck_wqgz sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_wqgz lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where jh_sbthcd=11-length(rtrim(#{sourceid},0)) and jh.sbzt='0' and jh.spzt='0' and gydwbm like #{sourceid}||'%' and xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqh},0)||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101030102' name,'01010301' parent ,'项目计划库' bz from plan_abgc jh left join sck_abgc sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_abgc lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where jh_sbthcd=11-length(rtrim(#{sourceid},0)) and jh.sbzt='0' and jh.spzt='0' and gydwbm like #{sourceid}||'%' and xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqh},0)||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101030103' name,'01010301' parent ,'项目计划库' bz from plan_zhfz jh left join sck_zhfz sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_zhfz lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where jh_sbthcd=11-length(rtrim(#{sourceid},0)) and jh.sbzt='0' and jh.spzt='0' and gydwbm like #{sourceid}||'%' and name,'01010301' parent ,'项目计划库' bz from (select distinct jh.id from plan_gcgj jh left join plan_lx_gcgj lx on (jh.id=lx.jhid) where jh_sbthcd=11-length(rtrim(#{sourceid},0)) and jh.sbzt='0' and count(*) id,'0101030107' name,'01010301' parent ,'项目计划库' bz from plan_shuih jh left join plan_lx_shuih lx on (jh.id=lx.jhid) where jh_sbthcd=11-length(rtrim(#{sourceid},0)) and sbzt='0' and spzt='0' and gydwdm like #{sourceid}||'%' and xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqh},0)||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101030108' name,'01010301' parent,'项目计划库' bz from plan_hsly where xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqh})

and sbthcd<=length(#{sourceid}) and tbbmbm like #{sourceid}||'%' and xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqh},0)||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101020102' name,'01010201' parent,'项目基础库' bz from xmk_abgc where decode(sbthcd,length(#{sourceid}),'未上报',sbzt) ='未上报'

union all select count(*) id,'0101040201' name,'01010402' parent ,'月报进度' bz from plan_wqgz jh left join sck_wqgz sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_wqgz lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where xjzt='未上报' and spzt='1' and kgzt='1' and jgzt='0' and gydwbm like #{sourceid}||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101040202' name,'01010402' parent ,'月报进度' bz from plan_abgc jh left join sck_abgc sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_abgc lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where xjzt='未上报' and spzt='1' and kgzt='1' and jgzt='0' and gydwbm like #{sourceid}||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101040203' name,'01010402' parent ,'月报进度' bz from plan_zhfz jh left join sck_zhfz sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_zhfz lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where xjzt='未上报' and spzt='1' and kgzt='1' and jgzt='0' and gydwbm like #{sourceid}||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101040204' name,'01010402' parent ,'月报进度' bz from plan_yhdzx jh left join plan_lx_yhdzx lx on(jh.id=lx.jhid) where xjzt='未上报' and spzt='1' and kgzt='1' and jgzt='0' and gydwdm like #{sourceid}||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101040205' name,'01010402' parent ,'月报进度' bz from plan_shuih jh left join plan_lx_shuih lx on (jh.id=lx.jhid) where xjzt='未上报' and spzt='1' and kgzt='1' and jgzt='0' and gydwdm like #{sourceid}||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101040206' name,'01010402' parent ,'月报进度' bz from (select distinct jh.id from plan_gcgj jh left join plan_lx_gcgj lx on (jh.id=lx.jhid) where xjzt='未上报' and spzt='1' and kgzt='1' and jgzt='0' and gydwdm like #{sourceid}||'%' ) union all select count(*) id,'0101040207' name,'01010402' parent ,'月报进度' bz from plan_gcsj jh left join plan_lx_gcsj lx on (jh.id=lx.jhid) where xjzt='未上报' and spzt='1' and kgzt='1' and jgzt='0' and gydwdm like #{sourceid}||'%' union all select count(*) id,'0101040208' name,'01010402' parent,'月报进度' bz from plan_hsly where xzqhdm like #{xzqh} and xjzt='未上报' and kgzt='1' and jgzt='0'

select distinct p.* from ( select c.xmmc,c.xmbm,'路面改造' xmlx,c.gydw,c.xzqh,j.pfztz,substr(j.xmbm,0,4) xmnf from jhsh_lmgz j left join cbsj_lmgz c on j.xmbm=c.xmbm where c.xmbm in( select xmid from lxsh_lx l left join zgb_zxlwzhtx_lxsh zg on l.id=zg.id where zg.zxlwlxbm like '%'||#{roadcode}||'%' and to_number(zg.zxlwzdzh)>${roadstart} and ${roadends}>to_number(zg.zxlwqdzh) and xmid like '%'||#{xzqh}||'%' ) and c.xmbm in (select xmid from plan_zjxd where jhxdwh is not null) union all select c.xmmc,c.xmbm,'改建' xmlx,c.gydw,c.xzqh,j.pfztz,substr(j.xmbm,0,4) xmnf from jhsh_sjgz j left join cbsj_sjgz c on j.xmbm=c.xmbm where c.xmbm in( select xmid from lxsh_lx l left join zgb_zxlwzhtx_lxsh zg on l.id=zg.id where zg.zxlwlxbm like '%'||#{roadcode}||'%' and to_number(zg.zxlwzdzh)>${roadstart} and ${roadends}>to_number(zg.zxlwqdzh) and xmid like '%'||#{xzqh}||'%' ) and c.xmbm in (select xmid from plan_zjxd where jhxdwh is not null) union all select c.xmmc,c.xmbm,'新建' xmlx,c.gydw,c.xzqh,j.pfztz,substr(j.xmbm,0,4) xmnf from jhsh_xj j left join cbsj_xj c on j.xmbm=c.xmbm where c.xmbm in( select xmid from lxsh_lx l left join zgb_zxlwzhtx_lxsh zg on l.id=zg.id where zg.zxlwlxbm like '%'||#{roadcode}||'%' and to_number(zg.zxlwzdzh)>${roadstart} and ${roadends}>to_number(zg.zxlwqdzh) and xmid like '%'||#{xzqh}||'%' ) and c.xmbm in (select xmid from plan_zjxd where jhxdwh is not null) union all select c.xmmc,c.xmbm,'养护大中修' xmlx,c.gydw,c.xzqh,c.tz pfztz,substr(j.xmbm,0,4) xmnf from jhsh_yhdzx j left join cbsj_yhdzx c on j.xmbm=c.xmbm where c.xmbm in( select xmid from lxsh_lx l left join zgb_zxlwzhtx_lxsh zg on l.id=zg.id where zg.zxlwlxbm like '%'||#{roadcode}||'%' and to_number(zg.zxlwzdzh)>${roadstart} and ${roadends}>to_number(zg.zxlwqdzh) and xmid like '%'||#{xzqh}||'%' ) and c.xmbm in (select xmid from plan_zjxd where jhxdwh is not null) union all select c.xmmc,c.xmbm,'灾毁恢复' xmlx,c.gydw,c.xzqh,j.pfztz,substr(j.xmbm,0,4) xmnf from jhsh_sh j left join cbsj_sh c on j.xmbm=c.xmbm where c.xmbm in( select xmid from lxsh_lx l left join zgb_zxlwzhtx_lxsh zg on l.id=zg.id where zg.zxlwlxbm like '%'||#{roadcode}||'%' and to_number(zg.zxlwzdzh)>${roadstart} and ${roadends}>to_number(zg.zxlwqdzh) and xmid like '%'||#{xzqh}||'%' ) and c.xmbm in (select xmid from plan_zjxd where jhxdwh is not null)
)p
